entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
